room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
review: Really enjoyed the special effects and the time spent developing the plot and room. I highly recommend trying this place out.

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
review: Really well done! Excellent plot. Excellent Puzzles. Excellent effects. Our family of four loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
review: Loved visiting Boone's first escape room while we were in town! We are in the Charlotte area and have been to at least 6 different locations here. The one in Boone is one of my favorites out of all of them. Can't wait to visit again after they expand or do a new room!

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
review: We played as a 4-some and really enjoyed this escape room. Storyline was an exciting one for sure! Room decor was awesome, special effects were really neat! Had not been in an escape room like this one before. Booking online was incredibly easy - can't wait to go back for a second room when it is open.

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
review: Great escape room. Awesome attention to detail, special effects, storytelling, and sweet automation in the room.
